question: Which ministry recently launched the Good Governance Index?
option2: Ministry of personnel, public grievances and pensions
answer: Ministry of personnel, public grievances and pensions
explanation: The Good Governance Index was launched by the ministry of personnel, public grievances and pension in light of the Good Governance Day. It is a tool for assessing the quality of governance in all states and UTs. It will apply in 3 categories: big states, UTs and the north-east and hill states.
